subject: Bass (Fish)
Fish and Other Marine Life
Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: After decline in the population of striped bass in 1970s and ’80s, the fish’s resurgence is one of the few great sea-fish recovery stories.
snippet: After decline in the population of striped bass in 1970s and ’80s, the fish’s resurgence is one of the few great sea-fish recovery stories.
